SYNOPSIS:- Ma Beta (1962)
Dependent on his elder brother, Bishan, Ganga and his wife, Rameshwari, are abused and asked to leave. They work hard, set up their own business, and soon become wealthy enough to even support Bishan and his wife. A pregnant Rameshwari gets the news that her husband has been killed. She subsequently gives birth to a boy, who goes missing. 

Bishan swindles his brother Ganga of his property. Although destitute, Ganga and his wife Rajeswari persevere and succeed. When Bishan finds out Ganga is successful, he becomes jealous and plots against Ganga to ruin his family. Ganga's pregnant wife Rameshwari finds out that her husband has been killed. She gives birth to a boy who goes missing.
